summary: This document is an email correspondence between Rich Larossi and Cynthia Rodriguez discussing the KYC (Know Your Customer) case related to The Pierre Trust. Larossi provides insights on the necessity of an EIN for the trust, indicating that most US Virgin Islands entities do not require one due to their classification as foreign entities.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is the recipient of the email discussing the KYC case.

persons.name: Rich Larossi
persons.context: Rich Larossi is from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management and provides insights regarding the KYC case.

locations: 60 Wall Street, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The email discusses KYC Case #01704382 related to The Pierre Trust.
Rich Larossi states that most US Virgin Islands entities do not require an EIN.
The Pierre Trust has a foreign grantor owner who would be the taxpayer.
